resources.string: Bluetooth microphone unavailable.\nPlease ensure your Bluetooth device is connected, then close and reopen the app.

This app was developed by members of Olin College of Engineering\'s Public Interest Technology group , who were working in tandem with students and faculty from Stanford\'s Prakash Lab. This app is meant to help medical professionals using the Pnuemask communicate, as the mask muffles sound and makes it difficult for the wearer to be heard by people in their surroundings. For more information about the Pnuemask project, please visit this website.
